class Appearance

Detailed Description

An Appearance component encapsulating material attributes for lighting computations.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: Material should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.

Member Data Documentation

const int AMBIENT = 1<<10 [static]

A parameter to setColor and getColor, specifying that the ambient color component.

const int DIFFUSE = 1<<11 [static]

A parameter to setColor and getColor, specifying that the diffuse color component.

const int EMISSIVE = 1<<12 [static]

A parameter to setColor and getColor, specifying that the emissive color component.

const int SPECULAR = 1<<13 [static]

A parameter to setColor and getColor, specifying that the specular color component.
